attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: with this current job situation i dont think we shold be means tested on what you wifes incom /your savings are  after 7 months  i want to work and there is nothing  how do i live?

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
